data.title: Late night eats
data.text:
It's been quite some time since I've indulged in some Arby's, and now I ask myself .....  WHY did I wait so long???

My son and I decided on Arby's only because the Indian restaurant nearby was due to close in 15 minutes and wouldn't serve us anything but take out (oh well, we'll try them next time).  

The place was virtually empty, making it that much more appealing, so ordering was a breeze, but a little pokey.  Although I'm learning that Utah might be on "aloha speed" as well as Honolulu (where I live), because everything seems to move vvveeeerrrrryyyy ssssllllooooowww here (except the interstate speed - DAMN - 70 MPH through the city....... LOVE IT!!!)

The staff were pleasant.

The joint was clean.

Prices were very reasonable (love the value menu).

The food was decent, a little dry, but the Arby's sauce and the Horsey sauce made it manageable.

I do want to try their ruben sandwich, but that can wait till next time, and there WILL be a next time - sooner rather than later.

data.title: Just okay
data.text: We tried their special chicken salad sandwich. The type of bread didn't go well with the chicken salad. It was okay but not as good as much of their foods.

data.title: Exactly what you would expect from Arby's!
data.text: Nice big, juicy burgers...heaps of fries, all washed down with a large Diet Coke...what more could you ask for? If you're looking for fast, filling food, look no further than Arby's.

data.title: If you're in Utah, in Sandy, you can get burgers here
data.text: We were stopping off here on our way to our holiday in Utah.  It was open, with friendly staff and fresh burgers.  I had the chicken classic and the salad tasted fresh and the burger was tasty.  I would recommend this if you're in the area - and you're hungry for a burger!

data.title: Good as usual
data.text: We always enjoy Arby's and this visit was no exception.  The only reason my review was not a perfect 5 was that we got to the order to go and did not get the "Bronco Berry Sauce" that usually comes with the Jalapeño Poppers.  We were asked if we wanted sauces but I did not realize that was one we needed to ask for.  Other than that the food was very good as was the service.

user_location.name: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States
